This is the first time that you execute me. I want help you. You are going to receive news from Usina Cultural, and to get them you should go in Configuration and then Categories to set the news you are interested in. Thank you and enjoy the app!

You will receive news from the activities in Usina Cultural, and to achieve it you have to set in Configuration and then Categories the news you are interested in.
You can also choose the frequency (Configuration and then Frequency) that your application check the news and you can choose (Configuration and then History) how many days of news you want to keep in your device.
That all, thank you.
